title: ihaparam iraNDilum
sahitya:
ihaparam iraNDilum sukhamuralAm eLidil mahimai mighum murugan malaraDi tozhudAl


anupallavi

  jagamidanil tanakku nigharillAp-pugazhoDu tigazhum addayALanai dinamum dhyAnittAl


caraNam    nondu nalindu vADa vandiDum vinaiyODa bandha pAsham ODa bhakt perukkik-kUDa
sendil sirandiDum kanda pirAnai nADi vandanai purindADi vAyArap-pugazh pADi
